title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI & REST-API server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi, etc. locally with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models for chat, LLM, embeddings and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI-Lite)
summary: Full-featured chat WebUI for Ollama (models, chats, RAG, admin).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama (chat, generate, pull, list, etc.).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli (tylerprogramming/ollama-cli)
summary: Rust-based TUI for browsing and chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: Ollama-GUI (Electron)
summary: Minimal desktop GUI for Ollama built with Electron.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat and generate code with Ollama inside the editor.

title: ollama-models-registry
summary: Curated list of community Modelfiles for Llama-3, Phi-3, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators & embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for running Ollama with Docker, Kubernetes, FastAPI, etc.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration to inject Ollama chat/embedding clients.

title: ollama-node
summary: Official npm package wrapping the Ollama HTTP API for Node.js and browsers.

title: ollama-python on PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package providing Python bindings for the Ollama API.

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting and showcasing Ollama projects.
